Jul 4, 2017

Hello World!

Hello Everyone, My name is Jerome Dinal Herath and welcome to my blog! I graduated from University of Colombo with a specialization in Computational Physics and now in the processes of migrating to Computer Science for my PHD. I’m natively from Sri Lanka, a beautiful tropical island in the middle of the Indian ocean. If you don’t know anything about Sri Lanka click here & if you plan on visiting a tropical paradise you would love Sri Lanka. Most of what I’ll be writing on my blog would be related to my course work, research and anything related to technology that I find interesting.

Happy Reading!

Cheers!
